titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Owosso Downtown Historic District Study Committee report

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.primary_name: Owosso Downtown Historic District Study Committee

did.unittitle: Owosso Downtown Historic District Study Committee report

archdesc.scopecontent: Report (with CD-R copy) documents historic Owosso, Michigan buildings, including both brief summary information and detailed descriptions of the buildings and the history of the businesses, industries, churches, etc. occupying them. The report includes scanned copies of historical photos of Owosso business and street views.

corpname.primary_name: Owosso Downtown Historic District Study Committee
